mapper.insert: insert into tbl_readers (reader_id, reader_type_id, role_id, reader_name, password, wechat, phone, address, id_card, birthday, sex, create_time, expiration_time, state, overdue_number, reader_code, session_key) values (#{readerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readerTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{overdueNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{readerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_readers set reader_type_id = #{readerTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reader_name = #{readerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, overdue_number = #{overdueNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, reader_code = #{readerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, session_key = #{sessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where reader_id = #{readerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select reader_id, reader_type_id, role_id, reader_name, password, wechat, phone, address, id_card, birthday, sex, create_time, expiration_time, state, overdue_number, reader_code, session_key from tbl_readers where reader_id = #{readerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select reader_id, reader_type_id, role_id, reader_name, password, wechat, phone, address, id_card, birthday, sex, create_time, expiration_time, state, overdue_number, reader_code, session_key from tbl_readers
